parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns if a control of the currently active user dialog is shown or not. Read [[Arma: GUI Configuration]] for more information about user dialogs and controls.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Boolean]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''ctrlVisible''' idc

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - control ID

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - true if the control is shown, false if not
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_bool = [[ctrlVisible]] 100;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlShow]], [[ctrlShown]]
</value></part></template>
